Topic.Title: Carl Icahn destroys jobs, livelihoods, families and investor profiles

Message.Msg: Carl is a billionaire ,he didnt get there by losing. But the problem here is Dell,wanting a company, they sold to shareholders, at the bottom after a recession,att the same time draining it for any value they can get, and in spite of this you see Ichan as the vulture. Your point is?

Topic.Title: Carl Icahn destroys jobs, livelihoods, families and investor profiles

Message.Msg: I'm sorry, perhaps you had a tough time reading my original comment or perhaps you just ignored the parts you didn't want to read? It's mostly all around bad news for all stakeholders unless of course your name is Carl Icahn or one of his cronies, are you? I mean are you one of his cronies?

Topic.Title: Carl Icahn destroys jobs, livelihoods, families and investor profiles

Message.Msg: Do you like your freedom? Well it's called capitalism. Survival of the fitest.
